title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: 1) Open an existing java file. 2) Make modifications (e.g., move an existing class). 3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon. A dialog will appear. 4) Browse for a valid container location. 5) Type the filename, but do not include the extension since it is not requested. 6) Click Ok. Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but without displaying any file extension.
EB: The file appears as a generic file, as opening it displays the file as text. Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
